title: Warning! Don’t open these hot PHOTOs of RISPER FAITH near you wife.
content: Home / Photos / Warning! Don’t open these hot PHOTOs of RISPER FAITH near you wife. Warning! Don’t open these hot PHOTOs of RISPER FAITH near you wife. The Kenyan DAILY POST Photos 11:05 Thursday, September 03, 2015 - Months after back-sliding, well endowed socialite, Risper Faith, is back with a bang ready to re-claim her lost glory. Risper has been posting a series of  hot photos as she tries to win back the hearts of her sponsors and from the look of  things, her phone is ever busy as rich men demand for her services. Below are some of her new photos that married men shouldn’t open near their wives or else, there will be trouble. The Kenyan DAILY POST  Tweet loading.. Leave a Comment Newer Post Older Post Home
